about_the_game:
WarZone
An old school style game where you taking a role of a tough soldier that has been sent to infiltrate an enemy base and destroy it.

Type of game
Top Down 3d shooter game with a linear action moving upwards

game characteristics

Change Player
Choose level of difficulty
Fight enemies , drones , tanks , human controlled turrets and robots
Use grenades , tanks , updated weapon
Pick up heath aid , ammo , grenades , shield
Do what ever it takes to complete your mission
Reach the highest score possible and get the first place on the score board


You can play this game on any device with windows installed and have a lot of fun .
Just make sure you have the requirements to run the game , which is not very high for a low end system.
This game is inspired from the old school top down shooters that were played back in the 90's.

name: WarZone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 , Windows 11
  • Processor: dual core CPU at 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB of GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A tough soldier has been send to infiltrate an enenmy base and destroy it.
